dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev just met with the new mayor of Almaty, Darkhan Satybaldy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev just met with the new mayor of Almaty, Darkhan Satybaldy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Head of State Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with the newly appointed akim (mayor) of Almaty, Darkhan Satybaldy, according to Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, the akim—that's what they call the mayor there, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, the akim-that's what they call the mayor there, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Head of State Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with the newly appointed akim (mayor) of Almaty, Darkhan Satybaldy, according to Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. And he was briefed on some pretty ambitious plans for Almaty's development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. And he was briefed on some pretty ambitious plans for Almaty's development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, President Tokayev was briefed on the key priorities for the upcoming work, including plans for socio-economic development, improving the urban environment, and enhancing the quality of life in Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Like what, for instance? I mean, Almaty is already a major city, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like what, for instance? I mean, Almaty is already a major city, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. They're talking about socio-economic development, improving the urban environment, and uh, enhancing quality of life.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. They're talking about socio-economic development, improving the urban environment, and uh, enhancing quality of life.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, President Tokayev was briefed on the key priorities for the upcoming work, including plans for socio-economic development, improving the urban environment, and enhancing the quality of life in Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That sounds like a full plate for the new mayor. Did Tokayev give any specific directions?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That sounds like a full plate for the new mayor. Did Tokayev give any specific directions?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He did—sustainable economic growth was one, and diversifying the economic structure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did-sustainable economic growth was one, and diversifying the economic structure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State outlined a number of key tasks for the development of the city, including ensuring sustainable economic growth, diversifying the economic structure, comprehensive modernization of urban infrastructure, improving the road and transport system, and addressing environmental issues.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm, interesting. I wonder what that diversification would look like, since Almaty is already a financial hub.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm, interesting. I wonder what that diversification would look like, since Almaty is already a financial hub.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Good point. They also mentioned modernizing urban infrastructure and improving the transport system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good point. They also mentioned modernizing urban infrastructure and improving the transport system.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State outlined a number of key tasks for the development of the city, including ensuring sustainable economic growth, diversifying the economic structure, comprehensive modernization of urban infrastructure, improving the road and transport system, and addressing environmental issues.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the roads—I've heard traffic can be pretty intense there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the roads-I've heard traffic can be pretty intense there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely, and they're looking at environmental issues too, which is huge for a city that size.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely, and they're looking at environmental issues too, which is huge for a city that size.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State outlined a number of key tasks for the development of the city, including ensuring sustainable economic growth, diversifying the economic structure, comprehensive modernization of urban infrastructure, improving the road and transport system, and addressing environmental issues.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, air quality and green spaces are always a challenge in growing metros.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, air quality and green spaces are always a challenge in growing metros.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It'll be interesting to see how Satybaldy tackles all this, especially being newly appointed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It'll be interesting to see how Satybaldy tackles all this, especially being newly appointed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Head of State Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with the newly appointed akim (mayor) of Almaty, Darkhan Satybaldy, according to Akorda.

dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Big shoes to fill, and big expectations from the top.
